article_title: Wish Book: A Miami foster kid, overcoming a tough past, grows up
article_text:
Student aging out of foster care needs computer for school

Dreams of becoming a lawyer and a chef

Percentage of foster kids graduating from college falls far below others

article_metadata.title: Wish Book: A Miami foster kid, overcoming a tough past, grows up | Miami Herald
